nirmali: na owunta ooni une mata mukuth de nodi inna...ape amma mata idamak liyala thiyenawa eeka pawa ganna thama ee ayata ooni une..mama dan oya amma kiyana kena nemeyi mage amma..eya marila...pasuwa ma piyata labunu dewani kasadaye lamun thama mage malaya saha nanga wenne..magen nidahas wela ara mama bandapu genage wasthuwata loba bandima thama sidda wenta giye..eeth mama akamathi una...

unwahanse gamana nima karagannayi aawe ara samanera bhikshuwak lesa , eeth wiharamahadewiyage illimatayi aramuna wenas kale.prashnaya: garilla markatin sinamawe oba thisarage bhumikawa thulin mano waidya widyawe 'binnonmadaya' wani roga wala pasubim kara elabenawa , 'sabbe puthagjana unmanthaka 'yana yatharthaya osse lokayama mayawak , oba kohomada ethenta prawesha wenne ?binnonmadaya mano wyadhin atharin ithama awasanawanthama rogayak, pudgalayekuge atha paya thuwala wunama ohuta awidinna bari wenna puluwani, namuth methanadi manase wena thuwalaya penne nane .

awangang amathyanshaya rajya aarakshaka amathyanshaye liyapadinchi wela thiyenawa.rajaya aarakshaka amathyanshaya ema balapatha්ra labadipu nisa owun paudgalika aarakshaka samagamak widiyata sewa pawathwagena gos thibenawa.rajya aarakshaka amathyanshaya waradak karala thiyenawa.ee thamayi nawika hamuda panatha yatathe paudgalika anshayata wanija katayuththak wenuwen awi aayudha labadima thahanam.ee waradda mehi wela thiyenawa.me gana man amathya mandalayedith katha karala thiyenawa.
